alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 28 at 1:07AM MST until November 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, except 8 to 16 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will result in areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...The Bear River Range including Emigration Summit and western benches of Bear Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing and drifting snow could make travel difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
